description: A light rifle developed during the Second World War to provide a less cumbersome weapon for soldiers that didn't need the firepower of the M1 Garand.  Firing the .30 Carbine cartridge, it provides more firepower than a pistol and is easier to carry than most other rifles.

//: The M2's cyclic rate is 750 rpm, while the M4A1's is listed as 700-950 rpm so eh, close enough.
description: An improved version of the M1 carbine offering full-auto capability, the M2 carbine was rare and coveted among collectors even before the world ended.  Takes M1 carbine magazines.
